item.title: CloutSlit:Private retrieval data network
item.description: Abstract 1. Introduce 1.1 Motivation 2.System Composition 2.1 CloudSlit-Fullnode 2.2 CloudSlit-Provider 2.3 CloudSlit-Verifier 2.4 DeCA 2.4.1 DeCA Decentralized Edge Trusted Computing 2.4.2 ROOT Certificate Confidentiality 2.5 Contract 2.6 DID User Network 2.7 Network Access Client 3. EVM Pool Abstract CloudSlit aims to build a decentralized web3 privacy data retrieval security network system around the world, and help users recapture privacy security information eroded by giants under web2, so that the current global hot zero-trust security network technology combined with web3 can better help users master their own security privacy data and give users a good experience of privacy data retrieval security network products.
